title: Mill on the Floss dyspeptic Puritans

content.prompt: In the final sentence of the passage (“But the . . . snowballs”), what is the main purpose of the allusion to “dyspeptic Puritans”?

choices.label: To highlight the significance of the plum pudding’s appearance
To express thankfulness for the ability to have a Christmas meal
To create a comparison between the cold weather and Puritan traditions
To emphasize the religious importance of the family’s adherence to Christmas traditions

skill.text: Skill 6.D: Identify and explain the function of an allusion.
